transcript:
Customer: Hello
Hello
Executive: Ha sir.
Customer: Ha sir good afternoon sir Arun sir India Mart lundhu solunga sir.
Executive: Adha andha latest tenders ellam varudhu la adhu eduthukonga eduthukonga nu message mail vandhuchu.
Customer: Purila sir purila.
Executive: Tenders tenders tenders.
Customer: Saringa sir.
Executive: Adhu mail vandhuchu indha maari eduthukonga apdinnu solli adhu pathi neenga edhume solalaya seri edhaavadhu vaarthai ketpomnu.
Executive: Illa sir tenders vandhu paathingana andha normala vandhu India Mart la irukum paathingala.
Customer: Aama.
Executive: Andha andha maari tender dha sir adhu vandhu tender oda information mattum dha idhula irukum sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Yaaru code pannirukanga eppo adhu close aagudhu andha maari information mattum dha irukum idhula tenders.
Customer: Seri adhu illa mail idhuku munnadi tender koduthurukingala?
Customer: Illa illa illa.
Customer: Adhavadhu namma adhu seiyala neenga vandhu tender eduthukonga eduthukonga nu mail vandhuruku mudiyapogudhu ungalukku lead irukku eduthukonga apdinnu vandhuruku adhanala dha seri ennanu.
Executive: Illa adhu neenga tender edukuringana ungalukku oru bylead kammi aagum.
Customer: Adha adha.
Executive: Adhu vandhu tender idhuku munnadi neenga eduthu koduthutu irundhinga apdina andha tender information eduthu adhu moolama neenga edhaachu kodukalaam.
Customer: Seri.
Executive: Illa namma koduthadhu kidaiyaadhu idhu varaikum koduthadhu kidaiyaadhungala?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Apdina adha neenga avoid pannidunga so tender vandhu idhuku munnadi eduthurundhavangalukku konjam easy yaa irukum idhula edukradhuku.
Customer: Oru nimisham oru nimisham irunga oru nimisham irunga.
Executive: Enna sir?
Customer: Aama aama adhu koranjiruchu adhu.
Customer: Adha click panna koranja maari varudhunnu solraanga adhu koranjiruchu.
Customer: Aana enna na nariya poturukaanga ippo namma specific kaana idhu edhum illa.
Customer: Specific powder powder.
Customer: Ippo adhilum ippo adhilayum vandhu namma specific ka choose pannuradhu maari option varuma eppadinnu therila enna.
Executive: Edhulan sir?
Customer: Ippo oru tender la vandhu nariya idhu poturukaan.
Executive: Aama sir.
Customer: Adhula vandhu peanut oil, til oil, korean oil nu irukku nu vachukongale ippo korean oil mattum namma kodukura maari irundha adhu thaniya code pannikalaama apdingara oru doubt irukku.
Executive: Illa sir actually vandhu tender pathi fulla idhula information enna enna na indha date indha idhula ivlo tender vandhu code pannalaam apdingarathu dha idhula irukum actually.
Customer: Oh coding code pannuradhu mattum dha namakku kodupaangalaam.
Executive: Adhu vandhu theriyaadhu adhu namma kodupaangala apdingarathu theriyaadhu sir idhula.
Executive: Yena ippo nammala maari tender eduthu yena avanga vandhu idhula mattum post pannirukka maataanga matha websites layum avanga vandhu tender post pannirupaanga.
Executive: So tender nariya varum adhula vandhu edhu tender poruthu varaikum endha idathula kammiyaana price kidaikudho anga dhaane code pannuvaanga.
Executive: So adhu vandhu namma kodukura price poruthu dha sir.
Customer: Price poruthu maarunginga.
Executive: Aama aama sir ippo namma namma matha mathavangala vida namma vandhu ippo kammiyaana idathula tender vandhu code pannirukrom apdina namakku problem kidaiyaadhu.
Customer: Seri.
Executive: Namakku kidaikuradhuku namakku kidaikuradhuku chances irukku aana vandhu namma confirm aa kidaikuma apdingarathu namakku theriyaadhu sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Apdingarappo idhu namma summa eduthaale adhu waste dhaannu solreenga.
Executive: Aah neenga neenga adhaan naan solradhu la idhuku munnadi neenga vandhu tender laam code pannirukinga koduthurukinga apdina neenga eduthukonga tender.
Executive: Illa idhu dha first time apdina neenga adha edukka venaam.
Customer: Seri seri.
Executive: Saringala.
Executive: So adhaan video meeting ku idhu ketrundhingale sir request koduthurundhinga adhukaga dha actually call pannirundhen.
Customer: Adhaan idhukku dha idhu dha ennanu ketpom apdinnu irundhen.
Executive: Oh indha idhukaga dha koduthurundhingala?
Customer: Aama aama aama okay okay ippo free ingala sir video meet join panna mudiyumgala?
Customer: Illa illa adhaan neenga soltingale neenga earkane pannirundha edunga illaina vendaangingle.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Seri naan paakaren sir.
Executive: Illa adhaan sir kekkaren ippo normala vandhu ippo mathapadi leads adhu ellame eduthutu irukingala?
Customer: Aama edukrom sir edukrom.
Executive: Leads ellame eduthutu irukingala sir eppadi irukku conversion eppadi irukku?
Customer: Conversion 50 irukku 50 50 50 namakku vandhu leads la irukku direct enquiry enquiry varudhu direct enquiry varudhu but closing vandhu konjam negotiations price negotiations varudhu.
Executive: Okay okay sir okay so namakku online poruthu varaikum apdithaan irukum yena maximum vandhu idhula manufacturers avangala theduradhala namakku apdithaan show aagum.
Executive: Okay.
Executive: Okay ingala so maximum vandhu neenga evlo dhooram vandhu edukuringalo ungalukku better aa irukum sir saringala.
Customer: Saringa sir naan enna paakaren sir.
Executive: Aah saringa sir mathapadi ungalukku edhaachum idhu irukingala issues edhaachum irukudhingala sir?
Customer: Illa illa.
Executive: Vera edhum issues illa okay saringa sir seri okay vera edhaachum ungalukku doubts illaina edhaachum doubt edhu irundhu issues irundhuchina call pannunga saringala.
Customer: Okay okay thank you sir.
Executive: Saringa sir seri okay thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer inquired about latest tenders.

- Customer asked about specific tender options.

- Customer unsure if tender is worth pursuing.



Resolution:

- Explained tender information and quoting process.

- Clarified that tender success depends on pricing.

- Advised customer to avoid if new to tenders.

- Executive offered assistance with video meeting.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will review the information.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- tenders, buyleads, pricing, video meeting
